additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Full Cream Milk, Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Cocoa Mass, Milk Solids, Emulsifiers (Soy Lecithin, 476), Flavours.

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Milk Chocolate contains Cocoa Solids 27%, Milk Solids minimum 24%. Milk and Soy.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Peanuts, May Be Present Wheat, May Be Present Tree Nuts, Contains Milk, Contains Soy

description: The equivalent of a glass and a half of full cream milk in every 200g of Cadbury Dairy Milk milk chocolate.Share Me!
name: Dairy Milk Chocolate Santa
